data.name: Cmd_Description
data.value: PSRule CLI

data.name: Module_Init_Description
data.value: Initialize a new or update an existing module lock file based on options.

data.name: Module_List_Description
data.value: List any module and the installed versions from the lock file.

data.name: Module_Add_Description
data.value: Add one or more modules to the lock file.

data.name: Module_Add_Force_Description
data.value: Override the module even if it already is added to the module list.

data.name: Module_Add_SkipVerification_Description
data.value: Skip verification of the module.

data.name: Module_Add_Version_Description
data.value: The target version of the module to add.

data.name: Module_Description
data.value: Manage or restore modules tracked by the module lock file and configured options.

data.name: Module_RequiredModule_Description
data.value: The name of one or more modules.

data.name: Module_OptionalModule_Description
data.value: Optionally specifies one or more modules to apply to.

data.name: Module_Remove_Description
data.value: Remove one or more modules from the lock file.

data.name: Module_Upgrade_Description
data.value: Upgrade to the latest versions of any modules within the lock file.

data.name: Global_Debug_Description
data.value: Return debug output.

data.name: Run_Module_Description
data.value: The name of one or more modules that contain rules or resources to use during a run.

data.name: Global_Option_Description
data.value: Specifies the path to an options file.

data.name: Global_Path_Description
data.value: The path to run commands within. By default, this is the current working directory.

data.name: Global_Verbose_Description
data.value: Return verbose output.

data.name: Module_Restore_Description
data.value: Restore from the module lock file and configured options.

data.name: Module_Restore_Force_Description
data.value: Restore modules even when an existing version that meets constraints is already installed locally.

data.name: Run_Baseline_Description
data.value: The name of a specific baseline to use.

data.name: Run_Description
data.value: Run rules against an input path and output the results.

data.name: Run_Outcome_Description
data.value: Specifies the rule results to show in output. By default, Pass/ Fail/ Error results are shown.

data.name: Module_Init_Force_Description
data.value: Force the creation of a new module lock file, even if one already exists.

data.name: Run_InputPath_Description
data.value: The file or directory path to search for input file to use during a run. By default, this is the current working path.

data.name: Run_OutputFormat_Description
data.value: Specifies the format to use when outputting results.

data.name: Run_OutputPath_Description
data.value: Specifies a path to write results to.

data.name: Module_Prerelease_Description
data.value: Accept pre-release versions in addition to stable module versions.

data.name: Restore_Description
data.value: Restore from the module lock file and configured options. This is a shortcut for module restore.

data.name: Run_NoRestore_Description
data.value: Do not restore modules before running rules.

data.name: Run_Formats_Description
data.value: A list of formats to enable.

data.name: Run_JobSummaryPath_Description
data.value: The file path to write a job summary.

data.name: Run_Name_Description
data.value: The name of one or more specific rules to run instead of all rules. By default, all rules are evaluated.
